articles.title: 'We weren't expecting these kinds of arrangements' - Hafeez critical of Canberra conditions - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: 'That was the slowest pitch a visiting team could ever play on in Australia," Pakistan team director says
articles.content:
News'That was the slowest pitch a visiting team could ever play on in Australia," Pakistan team director says
Danyal Rasool is ESPNcricinfo's Pakistan correspondent. @Danny61000
